lore.lightningcraft:angergods: 製作天域錠嚴重違反了規矩...現在，惡魔對你不在友好！
lightningcraft.electricium_info: Electricium is the most important metal in LightningCraft. Create it for the first time by striking an iron ingot, gold ingot and diamond on the ground with lightning.
lightningcraft.ichor_info: Crafted Ingredient. Create it for the first time by striking an Demon Blood, Skyfather ingot and emerald on the ground with lightning.
lightningcraft.guide_info: Create it for the first time by striking an book on the ground with lightning.
lightningcraft.skyfather_info: Skyfather ingots are a tier above electricium ingots. They're pretty cool.
lightningcraft.mystic_info: Mystic ingots are made from godly essence and are the most powerful metal in LightningCraft.
achievement.lightningcraft:swingGolfClub: 試著在空中揮舞高爾夫球杆，看看會發生什麼。
achievement.lightningcraft:getElectriciu: 使用鐵錠、金錠與鑽石將它們扔在地上，並使用雷電進行轟擊製作出雷鳴錠。
achievement.lightningcraft:craftTerminal: 製造出聚能器，並放置在LE儲存器上方。
achievement.lightningcraft:craftGenerato: 製造出一台靜電發電機
製造出一個需要以LE作為能源的物品
achievement.lightningcraft:infuseSpecial: 使用一把石劍為其注入特殊效果
achievement.lightningcraft:specialSwordK: 使用注入特殊能力的石劍擊殺一個敵人
achievement.lightningcraft:infuseSkyfath: 將一個雷鳴錠注能為天域錠
achievement.lightningcraft:upgradeCell.d: 使用雷電升級對任意一台機械進行強化
achievement.lightningcraft:craftWireless: 製造出一台發訊器與一台接受器來遠程傳送能量
achievement.lightningcraft:killDemon.des: 所謂的半神們準備使用惡魔來攻擊你，殺了它們！
achievement.lightningcraft:reachUnderwor: 將惡魔之血注入火焰彈，然後啟動傳送門。以進入冥界。
achievement.lightningcraft:mineUnderworl: 開採一些來自冥界的礦！
achievement.lightningcraft:craftRealloca: 製造出一台附魔轉換器
將天域錠注能為神秘錠
achievement.lightningcraft:mysticArmor.d: 穿上全套附帶電子場III附魔的神秘護甲
使用鋒利V與雷神護手III的神秘錘擊殺一個敵人
achievement.lightningcraft:perfectCell.d: 製造出一台玄奧儲存器！
guide.lclanding_text.name: 9by SBlectric and Rumaruka oA Guide to the\nWorld of Lightning!
